script.name: !fight.attack.object.std
script.sourceplaintext:
$time = get script priority skip if $time > 98 @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.ai.ammo.supply : ship (THIS)=[THIS] victim=$victim
$Fightskill = [THIS] -> get pilot fightskill if not random value from 0 to $Fightskill - 1 inc $Fightskill = [THIS] ->set pilot fightskill to $Fightskill end
$Countermissile = Mosquito Missile $dist = get missile max damage of $Countermissile if [THIS] -> is missile boat $Countermissile = null else if $dist > 400 $Countermissile = null else $Countermissile.Range = get range of missile type $Countermissile end $Next.M.Defense.Check = 0
restart: @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.drone.checkreturn :
skip if $victim -> exists return null if not $victim -> is of class Missile if not $victim -> is of class Ship skip if $victim -> is of class Station return null end end
if not [THIS] -> is of class Kha'ak Cluster if not [THIS] -> is missile boat if not [THIS] -> get maximum laser strength @ = wait randomly from 100 to 200 ms return null end end end
[THIS] ->set relation against $victim to Foe $TIMEOUT.IS = 10000 $TIMEOUT.OOS = 60000 gosub get.best.missile gosub check.victim $shields.check.old = [THIS] -> get shield percent $followdist1 = 4000 $s1 = [THIS] -> get size of object $followdist = $victim -> get size of object $followdist1 = $followdist + $s1 + $followdist1 + 100 $last.attack = 0
$IsPlayer = [FALSE] skip if $victim != [PLAYERSHIP] $IsPlayer = [TRUE]
$iskhaakthinker = [THIS] -> is of class Kha'ak Cluster $isbigship = [THIS] -> is of class Big Ship do if [THIS] -> is of class M6 $isbigship = null do if [THIS] -> is of class M7 $isbigship = null
$v.isbigship = $victim -> is of class Big Ship do if [THIS] -> is of class M6 $v.isbigship = null do if [THIS] -> is of class M7 $v.isbigship = null
$a.dist = 1 do if $v.isbigship $a.dist = ( $s1 + $followdist ) * 2
[THIS] ->set relation against $victim to Foe
while 1 @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.drone.checkreturn :
if $IsPlayer AND $victim != [PLAYERSHIP] $victim = [PLAYERSHIP] goto label restart end
skip if $victim -> exists break
skip if [THIS] -> is $victim a enemy break
[THIS] ->set attack target to null
if [THIS] -> is docked @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.undock : @ = wait randomly from 100 to 200 ms continue end $sector = $victim -> get sector
if [THIS] -> is in same sector as $victim if $victim -> is in a sector set script command target: $victim
* special for khaak thinkers if $iskhaakthinker @ $ret = [THIS] -> follow $victim with precision 3000 m : timeout=30000 ms if $ret != FLRET_TARGETREACHED @ = wait randomly from 100 to 200 ms else = [THIS] -> decouple ships * this task is stopped, so the following should not be necessary while 1 @ = wait 999999 ms end end else
skip if [THIS] -> is target visible $victim break $dist = get distance between [THIS] and $victim $bln.InSector = [THIS] -> is in active sector if $dist > $followdist1 + 200 * disengage target if they leave scanner range @ do if [THIS] -> call script !lib.check.target.isescaping : Target Ship=$victim disengage distance (opt)=null break
gosub check.select.fire gosub check.victim if $bln.InSector @ $ret = [THIS] -> follow $victim with precision $followdist m : timeout=$TIMEOUT.IS ms else @ $ret = [THIS] -> follow $victim with precision $followdist m : timeout=$TIMEOUT.OOS ms end if $ret != FLRET_TARGETREACHED @ = wait randomly from 10 to 20 ms continue end end
gosub check.victim [THIS] ->set attack target to $victim $random = random value from 0 to 100 - 1 if $random == 50 AND $bln.InSector AND ! $isbigship AND $dist < 3000 $random = random value from 80 to 100 - 1 $timeout = random value from 1000 to 7000 - 1 if random value from 0 to 3 - 1 @ = [THIS] -> defensive move: type=null, intensity=$random, timeout=$timeoutms, avoid object=$victim else @ = [THIS] -> defensive move: type=null, intensity=$random, timeout=$timeoutms, avoid object=null end else if $bln.InSector $timeout = random value from 10000 to 60000 - 1 @ $fire = [THIS] -> attack run on target $victim : timeout=$timeout ms else @ $fire = [THIS] -> attack run on target $victim : timeout=60000 ms end gosub check.victim gosub Missile.Defense
if $fire == FLRET_FIREFREE gosub check.select.fire if not $ret.csfm while $victim -> exists $playing.time = playing time if ( $last.attack + $ret.nextatk ) <= $playing.time gosub check.victim if $bln.InSector = [THIS] -> fire lasers on target $victim using turret null else $fired = [THIS] -> fire all turrets on target: $victim, next target filter=Ship end $last.attack = $playing.time end skip if [THIS] -> is in active sector break skip if $victim -> is of class Station break $missile = [THIS] -> find nearest missile aiming to me do if $missile -> exists break @ $min.range = [THIS] -> call script !lib.fight.getweaponrange : Ship=[THIS] $dist = get distance between [THIS] and $victim do if $dist > $min.range break @ $wait = [THIS] -> call script !lib.fight.getweapondelay : Ship=[THIS] do if $wait <= 0 $wait = 10 @ = wait $wait ms end end
else if $fire == FLRET_BREAK
if not [THIS] -> is target visible $victim $i = 1 skip if is script with prio 99 on stack $i = random value from 20 to 100 - 1 while not [THIS] -> is target visible $victim $wait = random value from 3000 to 6000 - 1 @ = [THIS] -> move around $wait ms
gosub check.victim
dec $i = skip if $i > 0 break end end @ = wait randomly from 50 to 100 ms
else if $fire == FLRET_TIMEOUT * fire missile even if we don't fire the main guns? gosub check.select.fire end
end
end else $time = random value from 5000 to 10000 - 1 @ = [THIS] -> move around $time ms end else skip if $follow break gosub check.victim if $sector @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetonextsector : sector=$sector destination=$victim else @ = [THIS] -> move around 60000 ms end @ = wait randomly from 100 to 200 ms end end
goto label end
* -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- get.best.missile: if not $no.bestmissile $best.missile = [THIS] -> get compatible missile array from cargobay if size of array $best.missile @ $best.missile = [THIS] -> call script !lib.get.best.missile.fortarget : Target=$victim Set Missile Fire Time Diff=[TRUE] else $best.missile = null end skip if $best.missile $no.bestmissile = [TRUE] gosub check.victim end endsub
check.select.fire: * (Cycrow) Check for shields if only targetting shields $done = [FALSE] $ret.csfm = [FALSE] $ret.nextatk = 0 if $shields $shields.check = $victim -> get shield percent @ $shield.threshold = [THIS] -> call script !lib.get.shieldthreshold : the victim=$victim if $shields.check <= $shield.threshold $done = [TRUE] $ret.csfm = [TRUE] else if $shields.check <= 25 $ret.nextatk = 2 $done = [TRUE] else if $shields.check <= 50 $done = [TRUE] $ret.nextatk = 1 end end
if ! $done skip if $best.missile gosub get.best.missile if $best.missile $shields.check = [THIS] -> get shield percent
$fireMissile = [THIS] -> should a missile be fired if [THIS] -> is missile boat do if [THIS] -> is in active sector $fireMissile = [FALSE] end
if $fireMissile if [THIS] -> get amount of ware $best.missile in cargo bay $ready = [THIS] -> is missile $best.missile ready to fire if [THIS] -> is missile boat $aMissiles = $victim -> get array of missiles aiming to me if size of array $aMissiles $ready = [FALSE] end if random value from 0 to 10 - 1 $ready = [FALSE] end gosub get.best.missile end if $ready $target.dist = get distance between [THIS] and $victim $m.range = get range of missile type $best.missile if $m.range >= $target.dist if $shields.check >= $shields.check.old
if [THIS] -> is missile boat @ = [THIS] -> call script !ship.cmd.missile.attack.std : target=$victim Missile to fire=$best.missile Number of barrages=1 else do if [THIS] -> fire missile $best.missile on $victim $ret.csfm = [TRUE] end end end end else gosub get.best.missile end
end $shields.check.old = $shields.check end end endsub
Missile.Defense: do if [THIS] -> is missile boat endsub do if $ret.csfm endsub skip if $Countermissile endsub skip if [THIS] -> is in active sector endsub $time = playing time do if $time < $Next.M.Defense.Check endsub $Dummy1 = random value from 10 to 20 - 1 $Next.M.Defense.Check = $time + $Dummy1 if not [THIS] -> get amount of ware $Countermissile in cargo bay $Countermissile = null endsub end $Incoming = [THIS] -> find nearest missile aiming to me skip if $Incoming endsub if $Incoming -> exists if [THIS] -> has same environment as $Incoming $Incoming.Ware = $Incoming -> get ware type code of object $Incomind.dist = get missile max damage of $Incoming.Ware $My.Shields = [THIS] -> get current shield strength do if $Incomind.dist <= 1000 OR $Incomind.dist < $My.Shields / 100 endsub $Incomind.dist = get distance between [THIS] and $Incoming do if $Incomind.dist < $Countermissile.Range $Fire.on.missile = random value from 30 to 130 - 1 $Fire.on.missile = $Fire.on.missile + $Fightskill do if $Fire.on.missile < 100 endsub do if [THIS] -> fire missile $Countermissile on $Incoming @ = wait 1200 ms end end endsub
check.victim: skip if $victim -> exists goto label end skip if [THIS] -> is $victim a enemy goto label end endsub
end: [THIS] ->set attack target to null if [OWNER] != Player do if [THIS] -> can be controlled by race logic [THIS] ->set relations from notoriety: include player as target and race > teladi as owner=[FALSE] end set script command target: null return null * changelog * 7. added emergency jump check. * 8. added shields check to missile firing * 9. fixed exceptions * 12. Added shield attack command * 13. added "get best missile array" to ease performance * 14: Removed emergency jump * 17: Added basic missile defense

disengage target if they leave scanner range

get ware type code of object
can be controlled by race logic
